name: LD48 - Volcanaclimber
description:
Climb downwards to reignite the sun with your sacred lamp, which lies at the heart of a volcano, for some reason. Also, the sun is green today!

Your hands can stick to the cave walls, but be careful not to hit the lamp against anything...

Note - you do not have to hold the mouse button down! Clicking & sticking is a toggle.

Made in 48 hours by me! Game made in Unity,  simple Metaball shader for the lava, Shapes (by Freya Holmér) library for the lines and discs. Music made in Ableton with Pigments 3.
